argument.name: P
argument.description: A pointer to the newly created browse.

argument.name: table_set_name
argument.description: The name of a table. The .DBF extension is assumed.

page.description: Sets the values of lNext and lFinish
page.discussion: The A5_BROWSE_CREATE() function displays the New Browse dialog, which allows you to select the fields that will appear in the new browse.
page.example: dim ptr as P ptr = a5_browse_create("travel time")
